text: Ni tinchaona wanganyao ali nkupelechedwa ku walakwe (Motowo), ali atetewele ligongo lya kunyosyeka, ali nkulola ni liso lyakusisa (chamunjenje meso). Sano awala wawakulupilile tachiti: “Chisimu wakwasika ni awala waalijasikasyisye (Mbepo) achimisyene kwisa soni mawasa gao (lelo) lisiku lya Kiyama (ligongo lya itendo yao yangalumbana yawaliji nkutenda ku duniya), manyililani yanti; chisimu walupuso tawe mu ilagasyo yakwendelechela.”
